mapper.update: update litemall_admin set username = #{username,jdbcType=varchar(63)}, password = #{password,jdbcType=varchar(63)}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=varchar(63)}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=datetime}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=varchar(255)}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=DATETIME}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATETIME}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=tinyint(1)}, role_ids = #{roleIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, last_login_ip, last_login_time, avatar, add_time, update_time, deleted, role_ids from litemall_admin where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, username, password, last_login_ip, last_login_time, avatar, add_time, update_time, deleted, role_ids from litemall_admin
